p.s: In the blog on enviromentenvironment, written by Ankita Mitra in the year 2014, is about the enviromentalenvironmental pollution as well as its causes and effects it has on us people and the earth.
The author describes how the earth is the only planet, where animals, plants and human can live.
Water and air keeps everything and everyone alive but the pollution of both of them is increasing every single day due to the growing urbanization and industrialization.
In addition to that the exhaust fumes of cars, ships, planes and nitrogen fertilizers as well as synthetic detergents, makes everything worse.
All of our food is contaminated and many different species of animals are in danger of their extinction.
There have been many tragic incidents, where poisonous gases got leaked and killed thousands of people or contaminated whole cities.
The environmental pollution has huge negative effects on our planet, espeiallyespecially the sea and on human health.
ScientistScientists are worried that the industrial progress is getting out of hand and that an age of mass extinction is coming closer.
All in all, it can be said, that if the environmental pollution is not going to less over the years, it is going to be very dangerous for the world.
